description: Play on words with 'drove pasta' sounding like 'drove past her.'
title: Pasta Car
n_1: Alex works on something odd in the garage.
n_2: Sister skeptically watches Alex fiddle with spaghetti.
n_3: Alex revs up the spaghetti car.
n_4: Alex zooms by in his pasta car, sister stunned.
c1_4: Told you I could drive pasta!
